snippet: Hawks swingman Kyle Korver set an N.B.A. record by making a 3-pointer in his 90th straight game in Atlanta’s 108-89 home win over Cleveland.
abstract: Atlanta Hawks beat Cleveland Cavaliers, 108-89, as Hawks swingman Kyle Korver sets NBA record by making a 3-pointer in his 90th straight game.
lead_paragraph: Hawks swingman Kyle Korver set an N.B.A. record by making a 3-pointer in his 90th straight game in Atlanta’s 108-89 home win over Cleveland.
